security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill containing file setup instructions. All operations are confined to project directories using standard shell commands. No network access, no credential handling, no external data flow.

content.user_title: Set up 2-Agent workflow with Cursor and Claude Code
content.value_statement: Managing two AI agents with different roles is complex. This skill configures a clear division between Cursor for project management and Claude Code for implementation, with proper file structures and memory management.
actual_capabilities: Generates Cursor custom commands for PM workflows
Creates Claude memory structures for context persistence
Sets up workflow rules and coding standards
Manages version tracking for configuration updates
Initializes session logs and decision records
Copies template files from plugin to project directory
limitations: Does not execute code or run commands directly
Does not integrate with external APIs or services
Requires claude-code-harness plugin to be installed

use_cases.title: Define tasks in Cursor
use_cases.description: Set up Cursor as PM agent to plan and delegate tasks while Claude Code handles implementation.

use_cases.title: Coordinate AI collaboration
use_cases.description: Establish clear handoff protocols between planning and coding phases across AI agents.

use_cases.title: Structure AI-assisted workflow
use_cases.description: Create organized workflow with memory persistence and decision tracking for better AI collaboration.

prompt_templates.title: Initial Setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Set up 2-agent workflow between Cursor and Claude Code. I want Cursor to handle planning and I want Claude Code to handle implementation.

prompt_templates.title: Update Configuration
prompt_templates.prompt: Update the 2-agent configuration to the latest version. Preserve my existing tasks and decisions.

prompt_templates.title: Generate Commands
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate Cursor custom commands for project overview, planning with Claude Code, and handing off tasks.

prompt_templates.title: Reset Workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Reset the 2-agent setup. Create fresh memory files and reinitialize all configuration files.

output_examples.input: Set up 2-agent workflow for my project
output: ‚úì Set up .claude/memory/ with session-log.md, decisions.md, and patterns.md
‚Üí Restart Cursor to see new commands in the command palette

best_practices: Use Cursor commands for planning phase before delegating to Claude Code
Review session logs regularly to track AI collaboration history
Update to latest version periodically to get new workflow improvements
anti_patterns: Using both agents on the same task without clear role separation
Skipping the initial setup and trying to configure manually
Modifying generated files without understanding the workflow structure

faq.question: What is the difference between Cursor and Claude Code in this setup?
faq.answer: Cursor acts as PM agent for planning and task definition. Claude Code acts as implementation agent for coding tasks.

faq.question: Does this skill work with VS Code?
faq.answer: No. This integration is specific to Cursor IDE which supports custom commands in .cursor/commands/.

faq.question: What files are created by this skill?
faq.answer: Cursor commands, Claude rules, memory structures, and version tracking files in hidden project directories.

faq.question: Is my project data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. All files are created in your project directory only. No data is sent to external servers.

faq.question: How do I update the configuration later?
faq.answer: Run the update skill to get the latest templates while preserving your tasks and decisions.

faq.question: Can I use this with other AI assistants?
faq.answer: This setup is designed specifically for Claude Code. Other AI assistants may not support the same rule format.
